title: Strategy Saturday
description: Join us for an afternoon of heavy strategy board games! All experience levels welcome.
body: We play everything from Terraforming Mars and Brass: Birmingham to Twilight Imperium. We usually have a dedicated teaching table for new players.

title: First Friday Casual Night
description: Kick off the month with lighter party and casual games!
body: We focus on quick, easy-to-learn games like Codenames, Ticket to Ride, and Just One. Bring your own drinks and snacks.

title: Mid-Month Magic Draft
description: Our monthly Magic: The Gathering draft. Entry is $15 to cover prize support and packs.
body: We rotate through different draft formats each month. Check details on the registration page.
